definition[0]: a shout or laugh that shows you think something is funny or stupid
example[0]: Hoots of laughter rose from the audience.
definition[1]: a sound that an owl makes
definition[2]: a short clear sound made by a vehicle or ship, as a warning
definition[3]: if a vehicle or ship hoots, it makes a loud clear noise as a warning
example[1]: The car behind was hooting at me.
definition[4]: if an owl hoots, it makes a long ‘oo’ sound
definition[5]: to laugh loudly because you think something is funny or stupid
example[2]: He had the audience hooting with laughter.
